Compatible with iOS 10, 11 and 12.

Vibrate when a call is connected and disconnected. There are options to select number of vibrations and delay between them.

Configure options from Settings.

XB-VibraCall 1.7 - Added arm64e compatibility. - Fixed "Enabled" switch sometimes change to Disabled.
- Added Downloads section to Preferences.
- Added option to change vibration method to old one (until XBVibracall v1.4).
- Added Slider to control vibrations time interval.
XB-VibraCall 1.5

- Fixed bug with vibrations after respring (Thanks Sara Hassan!).
- Recoded vibration from zero. Now is more accurate.
- Changed all sliders to milliseconds (ms).
- Added a new option to vibrate as Terminator BSO (YES! I "composed" it programatically, hehehe...)
- Fixed bug where tweak becomes enabled on every respring.
- Added vibration preview when settings changes.


XBVibraCall 1.4.1

- Fixed disconnected vibration duration.


XB-VibraCall 1.4

- Added option to control vibrations duration (by request).
- Added Arabic localizations.
- Added Italian localizations.
XB-VibraCall 1.3
- Added Spanish localizations.
XB-VibraCall 1.2

- Fixed Enabled switch sometimes changing to disabled.
